Name: Trap Hole
Description: When your opponent Normal or Flip Summons 1 monsterCard with 1000 or more ATK: Target that monsterCard; destroy that target.

Name: Mirror Force
Description: When an opponent's monsterCard declares an attack: Destroy all your opponent's Attack Position monsterCards.

Name: Magic Cylinder
Description: When an opponent's monsterCard declares an attack: Target the attacking monsterCard; negate the attack, and if you do, inflict damage to your opponent equal to its ATK.

Name: Mind Crush
Description: Declare 1 card name; if that card is in your opponent's hand, they must discard all copies of it, otherwise you discard 1 random card.

Name: Torrential Tribute
Description: When a monsterCard(s) is Summoned: Destroy all monsterCards on the field.

Name: Time Seal
Description: Skip the Draw Phase of your opponent's next turn.

Name: Negate Attack
Description: When an opponent's monsterCard declares an attack: Target the attacking monsterCard; negate the attack, then end the Battle Phase.

Name: Solemn Warning
Description: When a monsterCard(s) would be Summoned, OR when a Spell/Trap Card, or monsterCard effect, is activated that includes an effect that Special Summons a monsterCard(s): Pay 2000 LP; negate the Summon or activation, and if you do, destroy it.

Name: Magic Jammer
Description: When a Spell Card is activated: Discard 1 card; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it.

Name: Call of The Haunted
Description: Activate this card by targeting 1 monsterCard in your GY; Special Summon that target in Attack Position. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monsterCard. When that monsterCard is destroyed, destroy this card.

Name: Vanity's Emptiness
Description: Neither player can Special Summon monsterCards. If a card is sent from the Deck or the field to your Graveyard: Destroy this card.

Name: Wall of Revealing Light
Description: Activate by paying any multiple of 1000 Life Points. Monsters your opponent controls cannot attack if their ATK is less than or equal to the amount you paid.

Name: Monster Reborn
Description: Target 1 monsterCard in either GY; Special Summon it.

Name: Terraforming
Description: Add 1 Field Spell from your Deck to your hand.

Name: Pot of Greed
Description: Draw 2 cards.

Name: Raigeki
Description: Destroy all monsterCards your opponent controls.

Name: Change of Heart
Description: Target 1 monsterCard your opponent controls; take control of it until the End Phase.

Name: Swords of Revealing Light
Description: After this card's activation, it remains on the field, but destroy it during the End Phase of your opponent's 3rd turn. When this card is activated: If your opponent controls a face-down monsterCard, flip all monsterCards they control face-up. While this card is face-up on the field, your opponent's monsterCards cannot declare an attack.

Name: Harpie's Feather Duster
Description: Destroy all Spells and Traps your opponent controls.

Name: Dark Hole
Description: Destroy all monsterCards on the field.

Name: Supply Squad
Description: Once per turn, if a monsterCard(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: Draw 1 card.

Name: Spell Absorption
Description: Each time a Spell Card is activated, gain 500 Life Points immediately after it resolves.

Name: Messenger of peace
Description: Monsters with 1500 or more ATK cannot declare an attack. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase, pay 100 LP or destroy this card.

Name: Twin Twisters
Description: Discard 1 card, then target up to 2 Spells/Traps on the field; destroy them.

Name: Mystical space typhoon
Description: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; destroy that target.

Name: Ring of defense
Description: When a Trap effect that inflicts damage is activated: Make that effect damage 0.

Name: Yami
Description: All Fiend and Spellcaster monsterCards on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF, also all Fairy monsterCards on the field lose 200 ATK/DEF.

Name: Forest
Description: All Insect, Beast, Plant, and Beast-Warrior monsterCards on the field gain 200 ATK/DEF.

Name: Closed Forest
Description: All Beast-Type monsterCards you control gain 100 ATK for each monsterCard in your Graveyard. Field Spell Cards cannot be activated. Field Spell Cards cannot be activated during the turn this card is destroyed.

Name: Umiiruka
Description: Increase the ATK of all WATER monsterCards by 500 points and decrease their DEF by 400 points.

Name: Sword of dark destruction
Description: A DARK monsterCard equipped with this card increases its ATK by 400 points and decreases its DEF by 200 points.

Name: Black Pendant
Description: The equipped monsterCard gains 500 ATK. When this card is sent from the field to the Graveyard: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

Name: United We Stand
Description: The equipped monsterCard gains 800 ATK/DEF for each face-up monsterCard you control.

Name: Magnum Shield
Description:
Equip only to a Warrior-Type monsterCard. Apply this effect, depending on its battle position.
● Attack Position: It gains ATK equal to its original DEF.
● Defense Position: It gains DEF equal to its original ATK.

Name: Advanced Ritual Art
Description: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any 1 Ritual Monster. You must also send Normal Monsters from your Deck to the Graveyard whose total Levels equal the Level of that Ritual Monster.
